mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY FACSTOP.FSTP_CODE) AS ROW_NUM, FACILITY.FAC_NAME, FACSTOP.FSTP_PLAN, FACSTOP.FSTP_TU, FACSTOP.FSTP_STBY, FACSTOP.FSTP_01, FACSTOP.FSTP_02, FACSTOP.FSTP_03, FACSTOP.FSTP_04, FACSTOP.FSTP_05, FACSTOP.FSTP_06, FACSTOP.FSTP_07, FACSTOP.FSTP_08, FACSTOP.FSTP_09, FACSTOP.FSTP_10, FSTP_BIGO, FSTP_CODE, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, FACSTOP.FSTP_DATE, 120), 10) AS FSTP_DATE FROM FACSTOP INNER JOIN FACILITY ON FACSTOP.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE WHERE FACSTOP.FSTP_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} ORDER BY FACSTOP.FSTP_DATE, FACILITY.FAC_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FACSTOP ( FSTP_CODE, FAC_CODE, FSTP_DATE, FSTP_PLAN, FSTP_TU, FSTP_STBY, FSTP_SIL, FSTP_MAN, FSTP_MHR, FSTP_01, FSTP_02, FSTP_03, FSTP_04, FSTP_05, FSTP_06, FSTP_07, FSTP_08, FSTP_09, FSTP_10, FSTP_BIGO ) VALUES ( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(FSTP_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM FACSTOP), #{fac_code}, #{fstp_date}, #{fstp_plan}, #{fstp_tu}, #{fstp_stby}, #{fstp_sil}, #{fstp_man}, #{fstp_mhr} , #{fstp_01}, #{fstp_02}, #{fstp_03}, #{fstp_04}, #{fstp_05}, #{fstp_06}, #{fstp_07}, #{fstp_08}, #{fstp_09}, #{fstp_10}, #{fstp_bigo} )
mapper.select: SET LOCK_TIMEOUT 10000; SELECT FACSTOP.FSTP_CODE, FACSTOP.FAC_CODE, LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(datetime, FACSTOP.FSTP_DATE, 120), 120), 10) AS FSTP_DATE, FACSTOP.FSTP_PLAN, FACSTOP.FSTP_TU, FACSTOP.FSTP_STBY, FACSTOP.FSTP_SIL, FACSTOP.FSTP_MAN, FACSTOP.FSTP_MHR, FACSTOP.FSTP_01, FACSTOP.FSTP_02, FACSTOP.FSTP_03, FACSTOP.FSTP_04, FACSTOP.FSTP_05, FACSTOP.FSTP_06, FACSTOP.FSTP_07, FACSTOP.FSTP_08, FACSTOP.FSTP_09, FACSTOP.FSTP_10, FACSTOP.FSTP_BIGO, FACILITY.FAC_NAME FROM FACSTOP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN FACILITY WITH(NOLOCK) ON FACSTOP.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE where FSTP_CODE = #{fstp_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE FACSTOP SET FAC_CODE = #{fac_code}, FSTP_DATE = #{fstp_date}, FSTP_PLAN = #{fstp_plan}, FSTP_TU = #{fstp_tu}, FSTP_STBY = #{fstp_stby}, FSTP_SIL = #{fstp_sil}, FSTP_MAN = #{fstp_man}, FSTP_MHR = #{fstp_mhr}, FSTP_01 = #{fstp_01}, FSTP_02 = #{fstp_02}, FSTP_03 = #{fstp_03}, FSTP_04 = #{fstp_04}, FSTP_05 = #{fstp_05}, FSTP_06 = #{fstp_06}, FSTP_07 = #{fstp_07}, FSTP_08 = #{fstp_08}, FSTP_09 = #{fstp_09}, FSTP_10 = #{fstp_10}, FSTP_BIGO = #{fstp_bigo} WHERE FSTP_CODE = #{fstp_code}
mapper.select: SET LOCK_TIMEOUT 10000; SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY FAC_NAME) AS ROW_NUM, FAC_NAME, SUM(FSTP_TU) AS FSTP_TU, SUM(FSTP_10) AS FSTP_10, round(SUM(FSTP_SIL) / SUM(FSTP_TU) * 100,2) AS RunRate FROM dbo.vFacStop Where FSTP_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY FAC_NAME
